description: A TrafficSpace is a space in which traffic takes place. Traffic includes the movement of entities such as trains, vehicles, pedestrians, ships, or other transportation types.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the TrafficSpace.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the TrafficSpace.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the TrafficSpace.

properties.name: granularity
properties.description: Defines whether traffic spaces are represented by individual ways or by individual lanes, depending on the desired level of spatial and semantic decomposition.

properties.name: trafficDirection
properties.description: Indicates the direction of traffic flow relative to the corresponding linear geometry representation.

properties.name: occupancy
properties.description: Provides information on the residency of persons, vehicles, or other moving features in the TrafficSpace.

properties.name: predecessor
properties.description: Indicates the predecessor(s) of the TrafficSpace.

properties.name: successor
properties.description: Indicates the successor(s) of the TrafficSpace.

properties.name: clearanceSpace
properties.description: Relates to the clearance spaces that are part of the TrafficSpace.
